message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for it, if that's something you'd consider.
I understand that $120 is a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. If that doesn't work for you, I might have to explore other options.
I understand that $105 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $100.
Alice, I'm still a bit too high for my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's my final offer. If it doesn't work, I'll have to go with another seller.
I understand that $100 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $98.
